content.body: Kris Kowal: I guess I'd also expect them to be mutually exclusive (either through an error or ignoring), but putting a request for metadata in the same namespace as a request for data feels weird

content.body: `import.resolve` with consistent cross-platform behavior would be awesome

content.body: there's currently some contention about sync vs async in browsers vs node iirc
